attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As many of you know, there is a game circulating around the world that can only be stopped if the prime minister goes on live TV and announces the end of the game.
All this is asking is for the Prime Minister to go on TV and say the short phrase "The game is up"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
